name: BlueCargo
headline: BlueCargo builds software for trucking companies to optimize theirâ¦
description:
BlueCargo provides real-time information for trucking companies that move cargo from marine ports to first warehouses. We are building a platform that will be a one-stop shop for truckers to dispatch, schedule their workload and move containers efficiently

Our startup was founded by two female entrepreneurs, graduated from Y Combinator (2018 batch), and has raised a 4 million seed round. We are at the beginning of an exciting growth phase where we have already developed product-market fit, a working platform, and hundreds of daily active users. We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to grow the team and deliver a product to bring us to the next level.

If working to bring technology to the logistics industry sounds exciting, then weâd like to connect with you! We are looking for a highly experienced professional who has created several full stack web applications and has experience with AWS.

founders.name: Alexandra Griffon, Founder
founders.description: After graduating from ESSEC Business School and UC Berkeley, Alexandra started to work as a merger and acquisitions analyst (Lazard, Paris) and in the retail industry as a sales & stock analyst (Guerlain, NYC). She then followed her entrepreneurial spirit to take the plunge and co-founded BlueCargo - aiming at disrupting an industry that fuel our global economy.

on total freight spend

Who We Serve
![Process Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a38ebaa22602204a5c4879_ship.svg)
##### Shippers‍
Gain complete visibility into freight spend, automate AP workflows, and ensure vendors charge accurately
![Process Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a38f1a92c550dff954848e_logistics.svg)
##### Logistics Service Providers (LSPs)
Prevent revenue leakage, accelerate AP/AR workflows, and improve customer invoicing accuracy
![Process Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a38f2efde90bbc1b55e4e0_truck.svg)
##### Drayage Carriers & Brokers
Centralize invoicing, disputes, and accessorial monitoring in a single system of record to improve cash flow and reduce payment friction
## Reality Check
Even with a traditional auditing solution, **60% of accessorial invoices require manual review and domain expertise.** Free your operations team to focus on **growth, not back-office validation.**
What We Do
## Deploy AI Across Your International Procure-to-Pay Freight Lifecycle
[01**Freight Audit & Pay **](http://www.bluecargo.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[02Intelligent Insights](http://www.bluecargo.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[03System of Record](http://www.bluecargo.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a3b7a1ac04ad2e360986b2_audit.svg)
**Pre-Audit:** Prevent overcharges for ocean and drayage invoices before they happen by validating invoices against contracted rates, real-time port and terminal data.
**Post-Audit:** Audit historical invoices to recover overcharges and successfully dispute invalid accessorial fees.
**Touchless Invoice Processing:** 99% automation rate eliminates manual invoice validation.
**Seamless Vendor Payments:** Integrates with AP systems to streamline invoice approvals and payment workflows.
![Feature Card](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a77f673ca2444ea9deabdd_Audit.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a3b7b86e471e1d81c5ee48_insights.svg)
**Cost Benchmarking:** Leverage real-time port & carrier data to optimize rates and prevent budget overruns.
**Predictive Analytics:** Identify cost trends, risk areas, and future overcharges before they impact budgets.
**Automated Recommendations:** AI-powered insights flag potential disputes, suggest optimizations, and highlight financial risks.
**Real-Time Accruals:** Track financial exposure to prevent unplanned costs from disrupting cash flow.
![Feature Card](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a7738aa4c1da0476089b57_Insights.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a3b7cc6774b5bc7115122d_records.svg)
**Independent, Transparent Audit Logs:** Every invoice is cross-referenced with terminal and port data for accuracy.
**Real-Time Charge Validation:** Verify invoices against actual container movements, vessel events, and port transactions.
**Evidence-Backed Disputes:** BlueCargo maintains the industry’s only audit record with timestamped documentation to validate discrepancies.
**Multi-Party Financial Transparency:** Provides shippers, LSPs, and vendors with a single source of truth to resolve disputes faster.
![Feature Card](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a77a244dbb6364e4068e16_Records.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a66edc5133347f461d545c_experts.jpg)
Why Choose Us
## A Team of International Freight Experts 
##### 01
International Freight Expertise
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a2949c2a5f6a23b7625fe4_60bc6b240f575a2684ec9e69a3d55523_cheveron-down.svg)
The Only AI Freight Audit Platform with Real-Time Terminal & Port Data
##### 02
Master Complexity
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a2949c2a5f6a23b7625fe4_60bc6b240f575a2684ec9e69a3d55523_cheveron-down.svg)
Automate 99% of international invoices with zero manual intervention.
##### 03
Real-Time Evidence-Backed System:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a2949c2a5f6a23b7625fe4_60bc6b240f575a2684ec9e69a3d55523_cheveron-down.svg)
We don’t just automate audits—we verify charges with neutral party real-world port events and evidences.
##### 04
Plan for the Unplanned
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a2949c2a5f6a23b7625fe4_60bc6b240f575a2684ec9e69a3d55523_cheveron-down.svg)
Freight cost benchmarking powered by proprietary data.”
## **Trusted by 10,000+ Logistics Professionals**
### We saved $1.6 million annually in unverified accessorial fees.
![Quote](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a396bbb94edb752327afed_Quote%202.svg)![Quote](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a291ad66e098a7fdcb3dfe_a0ee838ff20770b63440429dc0539f63_Icon%20%284%29.svg)
Jordan Glastein, Senior Manager, Ocean Logistics and Strategy @ GE Appliances
### We recovered 85% of disputed charges using BlueCargo.
![Quote](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a396bbb94edb752327afed_Quote%202.svg)![Quote](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a291ad66e098a7fdcb3dfe_a0ee838ff20770b63440429dc0539f63_Icon%20%284%29.svg)
IMC
### We recovered $5.2 million in wrongful detention & demurrage charges.
![Quote](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a396bbb94edb752327afed_Quote%202.svg)![Quote](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a291ad66e098a7fdcb3dfe_a0ee838ff20770b63440429dc0539f63_Icon%20%284%29.svg)
Forrest Logistics
### BlueCargo is a game changer for our drayage business. It has improved our daily dispatch operations via better scheduling, providing us real-time information at our fingertips. Ultimately it has allowed us to provide detailed information to our customers to alleviate costs on their behalf.
![Quote](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a396bbb94edb752327afed_Quote%202.svg)![Quote](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a291ad66e098a7fdcb3dfe_a0ee838ff20770b63440429dc0539f63_Icon%20%284%29.svg)
Mark Darling - Senior Vice President @ STG Logistics

Frequently Asked Questions
## Have more questions? Don’t hesitate to reach.
The platform is user-friendly and offers various features, such as reporting tools and automatic invoicing.
We already have an auditor, and our process works
**Reality Check:** Even with a traditional auditor team, 60% of accessorial invoices require manual review. BlueCargo automates it entirely.
We have no IT resources and are worried about the process change?
**BlueCargo’s low-code implementation** enables onboarding in 4 weeks (vs. 12 weeks for industry competitors).
How do you handle D&D and accessorial charges?
Industry leader in D&D disputes—BlueCargo audits invoices against terminal & port data, ensuring evidence-based charge validation.
Why Now

#### About
Founded in 2018, BlueCargo is the premier platform to monitor, forecast, and mitigate D&D charges at the port. We build software to help carriers, shippers, and logistics companies move equipment in and out of the port terminals faster.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64c04ed0d0a1ab5fbea55e12/67a3b7cc6774b5bc7115122d_records.svg)
**Independent, Transparent Audit Logs:** Every invoice is cross-referenced with terminal and port data for accuracy.
**Real-Time Charge Validation:** Verify invoices against actual container movements, vessel events, and port transactions.
**Evidence-Backed Disputes:** BlueCargo maintains the industry’s only audit record with timestamped documentation to validate discrepancies.
**Multi-Party Financial Transparency:** Provides shippers, LSPs, and vendors with a single source of truth to resolve disputes faster.
![Feature Card⟨43⟩]

generated_description:
### BlueCargo: Streamlining the Trucking Industry

**Overview:**
Founded in 2018 and a graduate of Y Combinator's S18 batch, BlueCargo is a logistics software company based in Los Angeles, CA. This innovative startup was co-founded by two female entrepreneurs who saw an opportunity to transform the trucking industry.

**Mission:**
BlueCargo aims to be the one-stop platform for trucking companies, providing real-time information that optimizes the movement of cargo from marine ports to warehouses. The platform facilitates scheduling, dispatching, and streamlining container movements, ultimately enhancing efficiency and reducing operational hurdles.

**Current Status:**
Having raised a $4 million seed round, BlueCargo is experiencing an exciting phase of growth. They’ve achieved product-market fit with a working platform that boasts hundreds of daily active users. The team has grown to 35 employees, and they are actively looking for skilled talent to join their ranks, especially a Senior Software Engineer familiar with full-stack development and AWS.

**Key Features:**
1. **AI-Powered Freight Audit**: The platform automates nearly all invoicing, boasting a 99% automation rate, thus eliminating manual invoice validation.
2. **Real-Time Insights**: Users get predictive analytics and cost benchmarking integrated with extensive port and carrier data to mitigate unexpected costs.
3. **Seamless Vendor Payments**: Automated workflows simplify invoice approvals and payment processing, reducing cash flow friction for logistics service providers.
4. **Dispute Resolution**: They offer a transparent audit process, leveraging industry-specific data to validate and dispute invoices effectively with evidence-backed documentation.

**Customer Impact:**
BlueCargo has demonstrated its value through significant cost savings for its users. For instance, GE Appliances saved $1.6 million annually in unverified accessorial fees using BlueCargo’s platform. Similarly, logistics providers have reported remarkable recovery rates on disputed charges.

**Why Choose BlueCargo?**
Their cutting-edge technology not only helps automate freight operations but also offers a comprehensive audit system that improves accuracy and reduces costly errors. Their mission is to shift the focus of logistics companies from tedious back-office tasks to scaling their operations.

For more information, visit [BlueCargo's Website](http://www.bluecargo.io/) or reach out via email at [contact@bluecargo.io](mailto:contact@bluecargo.io). 

In short, BlueCargo isn't just improving logistics; they’re redefining it, making the trucking industry faster, smarter, and more efficient. If you’re passionate about technology and logistics, this could be the next step in your career to contribute to a monumental shift in an integral industry.
